memberdef.name: createNewTransactionInput

briefdescription.para: Creates a new TransactionInput object with no inputs or outputs.

parameterdescription.para: Computational Script for confirming transaction authorization
Transaction version as defined by the sender. Intended for "replacement" of transactions when information is updated before inclusion into a block.
The hash of the previous transaction.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new TransactionInput from byteArray.

parameterdescription.para: Raw data to create a transactionInput

memberdef.argsstring: (TransactionInput *self, Script *script, uint32_t sequence, ByteArray *prevOutputHash, uint32_t prevOutputIndex, void(*onErrorReceived)(Error error, char *,...))
memberdef.name: initializeTransactionInput

parameterdescription.para: Computational Script for confirming transaction authorization
Transaction version as defined by the sender. Intended for "replacement" of transactions when information is updated before inclusion into a block.
The hash of the previous transaction.

simplesect.para: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new TransactionInput object from the ByteArray.

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: brief Gets a TransactionInput from another object. Use this to avoid casts
Serializes a TransactionInput to byte data.

simplesect.para: the length written on success, 0 on failure

briefdescription.para: deserializes a TransactionInput so that it can be used as an object
